/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and trucks, hinting at the city's active transportation system. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day, and there are trees visible in the background, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape.
